resources.string:
MockGeoFix makes your phone support "geo fix" and "geo nmea" commands (compatible with the android emulator commands). "Mock Locations" must be enabled in developer options to make this work. 

Telnet to port %s using one of the IPs above and enter a geo command. For example: 
geo fix -121.45356 46.51119 4392

string.name: require_password_summary
string.b:
WARNING: Requiring password breaks compatibility with tools depending on the standard android emulator geo command behaviour.


Password is provided using the following telnet command: 
PASSWORD <password> 
Example: PASSWORD blue-taco
